title: The Simpsons Tapped Out 4.8.2 (Mod) Android

Overview: THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN! Homer accidently caused a meltdown that wiped out Springfield.


DÃ¢â‚¬â„¢OH! Now, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up to you to rebuild it! From the writers of The Simpsons, tap into a city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield... for FREE.
* This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.
HOW FUN IS IT? LET US COUNT THE WAYS!

1. First, you can get it for free!
2. Make Springfield just like you want it.
3. Help Homer find Marge, Bart, Lisa, and the rest of his family and friends! (Ned Flanders, too.)
4. Complete tasks to earnÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ mmm, donuts!
5. Make Apu work ridiculously long shifts at Kwik-E-Mart.
6. Grow and harvest Tomacco on CletusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Farm.
7. Party down with Duffman at Duff Brewery.
8. See how your Indolence, Consumerism,and Gluttony stack up on the Conform-o-meter.
9. Enjoy exclusive animated scenes sure to please fans of TVÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s longest-running comedy.
10. Visit your friendsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Springfields, play pranks, and collect cash.
11. And did we mentionÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s free to play?

SPRINGFIELD NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD
With HD graphics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get an eyeful of greener greens, yellower yellows, and more.

IS THAT ALL? Of course not! Did you know that you can even play this game in French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian and Brazilian Portuguese?

But who wants to read all this text on a screen? So you should CHECK OUT THE SCREENSHOTS because the screenshots really sell itÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ even though we really donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have to sell this gameÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ because itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s FREE!
**This game downloads additional content on first launch that can be up to 175MB based on device. We recommend connecting to WIFI the first time you play. This game is also supported with regularly occurring content updates that require additional downloads when released. Please be patient while it loads (we promise itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s worth the wait).**
What's New
The bunnies have gone the way of the snakes and fled Springfield. All that is left are piles of spoiled eggs, heaps of burnt hair and a ton of droppings. While your town may never smell the same again, at least another wave of pests has finally split!
Stay tuned as we have more Tapped Out characters, quests and donuts coming soon.
NOTES:
